content.prompt: The Roman Catholic Council of Trent (1545-1563) had as its primary result

choices.label: a compromise with Protestants to reunite Christians
a political compromise with the Protestant princes of central Europe
reform within the Catholic church and reaffirmation of Catholic doctrine
the firm reestablishment of conciliar power over the papacy
creation of a balance of power between the papacy and the heads of the great Catholic states

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
